bill.summary:
Puerto Rico Data Collection Equality Act
This bill addresses the collection and publication of statistics relating to Puerto Rico.
Specifically, the bill requires the Interagency Council on Statistical Policy to develop and implement a plan to collect and publish statistics regarding Puerto Rico in the same manner as federal agencies collect and report statistics for the states.
